Requirement_Description: Cloud platform orchestration and service management
REST API gateway for external clients
gRPC service interfaces for internal communication
CAN bus communication for legacy systems
TensorFlow model serving for cloud inference
Feature storage and serving for training/inference
Runtime monitoring of NN outputs for safety
Fallback to safe state on NN failure
Voting mechanism for redundant NN outputs
OAuth2/OIDC authentication for users and services
Encryption of data at rest and in transit
DPP query API for external access
Test harness framework for NN systems
Developer portal for documentation and tools
Observability stack for metrics and traces
Automated traceability from requirements to code
